item.title: NYC mayor candidate Mamdani withdraws from ABC town hall over Jimmy Kimmel suspension
item.description: A slew of Academy Award winners and other Hollywood celebrities signed a letter organized by the ACLU backing Jimmy Kimmel.

item.title: White House denies Homan received $50k from undercover FBI agents
item.description: The White House denied reports that border czar Tom Homan accepted $50,000 in cash last year from undercover FBI agents.
